extendedInfo.description: Aesop's Fables or the Aesopica are a collection of fables credited to Aesop, a slave and story-teller believed to have lived in ancient Greece between 620 and 560 BCE. The fables remain a popular choice for moral education of children today. Many of the stories, such as The Fox and the Grapes (from which the idiom "sour grapes" derives), The Tortoise and the Hare, The North Wind and the Sun, The Boy Who Cried Wolf and The Ant and the Grasshopper are well-known throughout the world.List of some Aesop's Fables :    The Ant and the Grasshopper    The Ass and the Pig    The Ass in the Lion's Skin    The Bear and the Travelers    The Belly and the Other Members    The Bird in Borrowed Feathers    The Boy Who Cried Wolf    The Cat and the Mice    The Cock and the Jewel    The Cock, the Dog and the Fox    The Crow and the Pitcher    The Deer without a Heart    The Dog and its Reflection    The Farmer and the Stork    The Farmer and the Viper    The Fir and the Bramble    The fisherman and the little fish    The Fox and the Crow    The Fox and the Grapes    The Fox and the Sick Lion    The Fox and the Stork    The Frog and the Ox    The Frogs Who Desired a King    The Goose that Laid the Golden Eggs    The Honest Woodcutter    The Lion and the Fox    The Lion and the Mouse    The Lion's Share    The Lion, the Bear and the Fox    The Mischievous Dog    The Mountain in Labour    The North Wind and the Sun    The Oak and the Reed    The Satyr and the Traveller    The Tortoise and the Birds    The Tortoise and the Hare    The Town Mouse and the Country Mouse    The Trees and the Bramble    The Two Pots    Venus and the Cat    The Walnut Tree    Washing the Ethiopian white    The Wolf and the Lamb    The Wolf and the Crane    The Young Man and the Swallow***Important***In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen,Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage.This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.

reviews.comment: This app was good and then it added ad functionality which shares my email address with people I don\'t want to share it with so I have lost total trust in it. I\'m only giving it one star because I can\'t give it zero.
reviews.author: Rob Frost

reviews.title: I removed it due to ads
reviews.comment: Airpush notification is annoying. I just have to one a version that doesn\'t do that
reviews.author: Timothy Law

reviews.title: Aesop\'s Fables
reviews.comment: This is by far the best and most reliable representation of these tales. Though it has no pictures, I have had no trouble with it and the personalization that is shown through font size and background color helped me read the huge selection better. If you are going to get any Aesop\'s Fables applications, get this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: I would\'ve given it 5 stars but there are English mistakes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Data snooping app
reviews.comment: It\'s too bad that this app has had ads that install and run in the background and appears to snoop on your information!
reviews.author: kevcsmith
